<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The nature of the services provided by Deloitte LLP under each of the categories indicated in the table is described below.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Audit Fees
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Audit fees are those incurred for professional services rendered by Deloitte LLP for the audit of the Company's annual consolidated financial statements, for the interim reviews of the Company's unaudited consolidated financial statements, additional services provided in connection with statutory and regulatory filings or engagements, including for the Company's wholly owned subsidiaries, Minera Los Lagartos, S.A. de C.V., Minera Pozo Seco S.A. de C.V., and Minera Sierra Vieja S.A. de C.V.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Audit-Related Fees
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Audit-related fees are those incurred for: i) professional services rendered by Deloitte LLP relating to the short form prospectus and ii) professional fees related to the Mexican statutory audit.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Tax Fees
</FONT>
	(tax compliance, tax advice and tax planning)
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Tax fees are those incurred for professional services rendered by Deloitte LLP for:&#160; tax compliance, including the review of tax returns, tax planning and advisory services relating to common forms of domestic and international taxation (i.e. income tax, capital tax, goods and services tax, payroll tax and value added tax); continued tax planning and advisory services on potential restructuring and spin-out projects; and, preparation of a Transfer Pricing report.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	All Other Fees
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	There are no other fees to report under this category for professional services rendered by Deloitte LLP for the Company.

	INTEREST OF MANAGEMENT AND OTHERS IN MATERIAL TRANSACTIONS
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	No director, executive officer or principal shareholder of the Company, or any associate or affiliate of the foregoing, has had any material interest, direct or indirect, in any transaction within the three most recently completed financial years or during the current financial year prior to the date of this AIF that has materially affected or is reasonably expected to materially affect the Company, except as otherwise disclosed in this AIF and as follows:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Dr. Peter Megaw, of Arizona, USA, became a member of the Board of Directors of the Company on February 6, 2006 and ceased to be a member of the Board of Directors on June 23, 2014. Dr. Megaw has since been appointed Chief Exploration Officer of the Company, although he continues to be remunerated through IMDEX as outlined below, with the exception of equity incentives (stock options and restricted and performance share units), which are granted directly to Dr. Megaw.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Dr. Megaw is a principal of Minera Bugambilias, S.A. de C.V. ("Bugambilias") and Minera Coralillo, S.A. de C.V. ("Coralillo"). The Company acquired the mineral claims of the Batopilas property in 2005 from Bugambilias and Bugambilias has retained a NSR royalty interest in that property, although the property has now been written off by the Company effective December 31, 2014. The Company acquired the mineral claims of the Guigui property in 2002 from Coralillo and Coralillo has retained a NSR royalty interest in that property. As noted above in "Other Business Risks," Dr. Megaw is also a principal of IMDEX and Cascabel. The Company is obligated to a 2.5% NSR royalty on the Cinco de Mayo property payable to the principals of Cascabel under the terms of an option agreement dated February 26, 2004, whereby the Company acquired a 100% interest in the property from Cascabel, and under the terms of assignment agreements entered into by Cascabel with its principals. Further, Cascabel has been and will continue to be retained by the Company as a consulting geological firm compensated at industry standard rates.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The Company accrued or paid Cascabel and IMDEX the following fees under the Field Services Agreement:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Within the Field Services Agreement between the MAG and Cascabel/IMDEX, a 'Right of First Refusal' has been granted to MAG for any silver properties Cascabel/IMDEX may come across.&#160; As part of this agreement, Cascabel/IMDEX have agreed to grant MAG the right of first refusal to examine all silver properties currently in their control, or brought to their attention by others.&#160; MAG, and solely at MAG's discretion, may lease, option, purchase, joint venture or otherwise acquire an interest in such silver properties as may be known or offered by Cascabel/IMDEX to MAG.&#160; In recognition of the work carried out by Cascabel/IMDEX to introduce such properties to MAG, a reasonably negotiated Finder's Fee may be payable by MAG on any new property of merit.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	Upon the retirement of Dan MacInnis as President &amp; Chief Executive Officer, on October 15, 2013, the Company entered into a consulting contract with a private company controlled by Mr. MacInnis, to which it paid or accrued consulting fees of C$11,000 in the year ended December 31, 2015 (December 31, 2014: C$548,232).&#160; The consulting contract expired on December 31, 2014, and was renewed in early 2015 on a per diem basis.&#160; Mr. MacInnis remains as a member of the Board of Directors.
</DIV>

	(the "Corporation")

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 12.55PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT">

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="14434AC3B7DF4952B3CE4652755ECDD0" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PX; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	1.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 22PX; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; ALIGN: RIGHT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<U>
	General
</U>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	&#160;
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The Board of Directors of the Corporation (the "Board") has established an Audit Committee (the "Committee") to assist the Board in fulfilling its oversight responsibilities.&#160; The Committee will review and oversee the financial reporting and accounting process of the Corporation, the system of internal control and management of financial risks, the external audit process, and the Corporation's process for monitoring compliance with laws and regulations and its own code of business conduct.&#160; In performing its duties, the Committee will maintain effective working relationships with the Board, management, and the external auditors and monitor the independence of those auditors.&#160; To perform his or her role effectively, each Committee member will obtain an understanding of the responsibilities of Committee membership as well as the Corporation's business, operations and risks.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The Corporation's independent auditor is ultimately accountable to the Board and to the Committee. The Board and Committee, as representatives of the Corporation's shareholders, have the ultimate authority and responsibility to evaluate the independent auditor, to nominate annually the independent auditor to be proposed for shareholder approval, to determine appropriate compensation for the independent auditor, and where appropriate, to replace the outside auditor.&#160; In the course of fulfilling its specific responsibilities hereunder, the Committee must maintain free and open communication between the Corporation's independent auditors, Board and Corporation management.&#160; The responsibilities of a member of the Committee are in addition to such member's duties as a member of the Board.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="A10C556AA7EE42C3B6BEE77F9778B9D9" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PX; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	2.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 22PX; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; ALIGN: RIGHT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<U>
	Members
</U>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The Board will in each year appoint a minimum of three (3) directors as members of the Committee.&#160; All members of the Committee shall be non-management directors and shall be independent within the meaning of all applicable U.S. and Canadian securities laws and the rules of the Toronto Stock Exchange and the NYSE MKT LLC, unless otherwise exempt from such requirements.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	None of the members of the Committee may have participated in the preparation of the financial statements of the Corporation or any current subsidiary of the Corporation at any time during the past three years.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	All members of the Committee shall be able to read and understand fundamental financial statements and must be financially literate within the meaning of all applicable U.S. and Canadian securities laws or become financially literate within a reasonable period of time following his or her appointment.&#160; Additionally, at least one member of the Committee shall be financially sophisticated and shall have past employment experience in finance or accounting, requisite professional certification in accounting, or any other comparable experience or background which results in the individual's financial sophistication, which may include being or having been a chief executive officer, chief financial officer, or other senior officer with financial oversight responsibilities.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&#160;
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: NORMAL; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBER">

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="D0EEF288F58541E8B026306FA606420B" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PX; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	3.
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 22PX; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; ALIGN: RIGHT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
<U>
	Duties
</U>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 12PT; FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	The Committee will have the following duties:
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="04C46D7BBB89484F8D51286A257BDA70" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	&#183;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV>
	Gain an understanding of whether internal control recommendations made by external auditors have been implemented by management.
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="C1D65376D1A74BBB997539C2B22A5B4B" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	&#183;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV>
	Gain an understanding of the current areas of greatest financial risk and whether management is managing these effectively.
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="9877F9A6D6C7479ABF6F1FFAA290C27D" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	&#183;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV>
	Review significant accounting and reporting issues, including recent professional and regulatory pronouncements, and understand their impact on the financial statements.
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="53733410E56E4C199055A5BC484E0E39" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	&#183;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV>
	Review any legal matters which could significantly impact the financial statements as reported on by the Corporation's counsel and engage outside independent counsel and other advisors whenever as deemed necessary by the Committee to carry out its duties.
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="A4808C0AC8D34F29889279ECE6E593EF" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	&#183;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV>
	Review the Corporation's annual and quarterly financial statements, including Management's Discussion and Analysis with respect thereto, and all annual and interim earnings press releases, prior to public dissemination, including any certification, report, opinion or review rendered by the external auditors and determine whether they are complete and consistent with the information known to Committee members; determine that the auditors are satisfied that the financial statements have been prepared in accordance with International Financial Reporting Standards as issued by the International Accounting Standards Board ("IFRS"). Pay particular attention to complex and/or unusual transactions such as those involving derivative instruments and consider the adequacy of disclosure thereof.
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="971CCC8C34344788A39700A4E7D59B9A" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	&#183;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV>
	Focus on judgmental areas, for example those involving valuation of assets and liabilities and other commitments and contingencies.
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="7F6E124D2AEB44E3BCDC42A1CFBBADE1" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	&#183;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV>
	Review audit issues related to the Corporation's material associated and affiliated companies that may have a significant impact on the Corporation's equity investment.
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="AF4527B8403549ABB5410FA8D2C2B400" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	&#183;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV>
	Meet with management and the external auditors to review the annual financial statements and the results of the audit.
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="907A6F6C41EC425C8C67757FB93517ED" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	&#183;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV>
	Evaluate the fairness of the interim financial statements and related disclosures including the associated Management's Discussion and Analysis, and obtain explanations from management on whether:
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="7023BC206896423CB74B9C9287EC467A" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 54PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	&#183;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV>
	actual financial results for the interim period varied significantly from budgeted or projected results;
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="363FE615D1A14A1281E376F3F041C22E" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 54PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	&#183;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV>
	generally accepted accounting principles have been consistently applied;
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="D3EBB237740F4EC4B57611F94514A6E0" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 54PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	&#183;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV>
	there are any actual or proposed changes in accounting or financial reporting practices; or
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 10PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: NORMAL; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBER">
	77
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: BOTH; BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage99"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="C5B4E8274C6140EEA2A1A84138D582BE" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 54PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	&#183;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV>
	there are any significant or unusual events or transactions which require disclosure and, if so, consider the adequacy of that disclosure.
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="2BC748CFB85B41978547A724AB6A6C3F" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	&#183;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV>
	Review the external auditors' proposed audit scope and approach and ensure no unjustifiable restriction or limitations have been placed on the scope.
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="93EEE6739D3B4C30ADFC4BF289723AC3" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	&#183;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV>
	Recommend to the Board an external auditor to be nominated for appointment by the Corporation's shareholders.&#160; Subject to the appointment of the Corporation's external auditor by the Corporation's shareholders, the Committee will be directly responsible for the appointment, compensation, retention and oversight of the work of external auditor engaged for the purpose of preparing or issuing an auditor's report or performing other audit, review or attest services for the Corporation, including the resolution of disagreements between management and the external auditor regarding financial reporting.&#160; The Corporation's external auditor shall report directly to the Committee.
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="7137333A920444E0BE5CB62D832AFC22" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	&#183;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV>
	Review with the Corporation's management, on a regular basis, the performance of the external auditors, the terms of the external auditor's engagement, accountability and experience.
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="FAFDA0AA6C3849D1BC1C8C9EE16F264C" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	&#183;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV>
	Pre-approve all non-audit services to be provided to the Corporation or its subsidiary entities by the external auditor.
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="4C5D61C54A264C879305070958624212" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	&#183;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV>
	Consider at least annually the independence of the external auditors, including reviewing the range of services provided in the context of all consulting services obtained by the Corporation, including:
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="2219A7310598417186C110B72EFFC021" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	&#183;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV>
	insuring receipt from the independent auditor of a formal written statement delineating all relationships between the independent auditor and the Company, consistent with the Independence Standards Board Standard No. 1 and related Canadian regulatory body standards;
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="F9698A1D487A4E6BA54C630C83C5B272" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	&#183;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV>
	considering and discussing with the independent auditor any relationships or services, including non-audit services, that may impact the objectivity and independence of the independent auditor; and
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="F2A5C192A62C433481C75DCCDE933DFE" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT; FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	&#183;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
	as necessary, taking, or recommending that the Board take, appropriate action to oversee the independence of the independent auditor.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="18E20557C1814BCCAF0A36AF253DF193" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	&#183;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV>
	Ensure that adequate procedures are in place for the review of the Corporation's public disclosure of financial information extracted or derived from the Corporation's financial statements, other than the public disclosure contained in the Corporation's financial statements, Management's Discussion and Analysis and annual and interim earnings press releases; and must periodically assess the adequacy of those procedures.
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="D22F878B229844098DE141DAFC01FDCD" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	&#183;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV>
	Review any significant disagreement among management and the external auditors in connection with the preparation of the financial statements.
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="5728D5AF184544ABB8388DEE50958555" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	&#183;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV>
	Review and approve the Corporation's hiring policies regarding partners, employees and former partners and employees of the present and former external auditors of the Corporation.
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="7406B4D0D9DF4C19875AEE196DB89BED" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	&#183;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV>
	Establish a procedure for:
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-TOP: 10PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH" ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA">
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-STYLE: NORMAL; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-WEIGHT: NORMAL" ID="DSPFPAGENUMBER">

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="1ED66EDFA0684D2FA0F834A718F9D2FC" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

<DIV>
	the confidential, anonymous submission by employees of the Corporation of concerns regarding questionable accounting or auditing matters; and
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="4070F26CD1BA4026B4B84218ABB7DE48" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

<DIV>
	the receipt, retention and treatment of complaints received by the Corporation regarding accounting, internal accounting controls, or auditing matters.
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="F16241B9A7EE4E38A2DA5C432C4A0F74" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV>
	Meet separately with the external auditors to discuss any matters that the committee or auditors believe should be discussed privately in the absence of management.
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="ABFD7E99EDDE44F08D955B16206725E0" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

<DIV>
	Endeavour to cause the receipt and discussion on a timely basis of any significant findings and recommendations made by the external auditors.
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="A64D3B44638146DD82CC8730F7BCA310" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

<DIV>
	Ensure that the Board is aware of matters which may significantly impact the financial condition or affairs of the business.
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">

</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">

	If necessary, institute special investigations and, if appropriate, hire special counsel or experts to assist, and set the compensation to be paid to such special counsel or other experts.
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">

</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="87F5D3894C394A0480B3B9FBCBE4246C" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

<DIV>
	With regard to the Corporation's internal control procedures, the Committee is responsible to:
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="BB2D44B07D7F4C4093F4396210117ECD" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 54PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	&#183;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV>
	review the appropriateness and effectiveness of the Corporation's policies and business practices which impact on the financial integrity of the Corporation, including those related to internal auditing, insurance, accounting, information services and systems and financial controls, management reporting and risk management; and
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="6206C46388AB43D1B91E28381FF4A6F8" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 54PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">

<DIV>
	review compliance under the Corporation's business conduct and ethics policies and to periodically review these policies and recommend to the Board changes which the Committee may deem appropriate; and
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="27B8AF11BD804ACDA386EDD341ED62C8" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

<DIV>
	review any unresolved issues between management and the external auditors that could affect the financial reporting or internal controls of the Corporation; and
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="C8FA40863DF745DE9EB795328516418E" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 18PT; FONT-FAMILY: SYMBOL, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	&#183;
</TD>
<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV>
	periodically review the Corporation's financial and auditing procedures and the extent to which recommendations made by the internal audit staff or by the external auditors have been implemented.
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT" ID="89E66932DE3E4E66AFE7FD8C40FA2C90" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

	&#183;

<TD STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-SIZE: 10PT; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP">
<DIV>
	Comply with Rule 10A &#8211; 3(b)(2), (3), (4) and (5) under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934.
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

	&#160;
